t: Brands Forced To Choose Between Amazon And Retailers
s: September 21, 2018 - Other brands have skipped Amazon entirely and committed to one or more major retail chains. Makeup company Crushed Tonic has chosen to forego Amazon and sell its products at Sephora instead. Sephora requires exclusivity, refusing to stock products that can be purchased on Amazon.
